channel.title: Imperium - Spawn - Rares - Auto Vote - Donate - 24/7
channel.description:
[B][SIZE=5][URL=http://imperium.byethost22.com"]WEBSITE [/URL][/SIZE][/B] [B][SIZE=5]About[/SIZE][/B]
Imperium is a fun server, where you can basically login and PK straight away! On Imperium, you have the option to spawn items, as well as having the option to change your levels and stats! Whether you are a experienced PKer or if you just started PKng, Imperium is the right server for you! This server is filled with content and it's enjoyable! There are always people PKing, so why not join in the fun? We have a nice and friendly community, and at Imperium, you can become one of the best PKers! There is no other place like Imperium. The home for this server is Edgeville.Imperium is a unique server due to the fact that we have a friendly and charming community. Imperium has the potential to be one of the best servers in history, it's just we need more players! There are many PK hotspots scattered around everywhere in Imperium, ranging from Mage Bank, Edgeville, Ice Plateau and many more places! Imperium has been up for a very long time. At one stage, Imperium hit a personal best of 140 players on at one time! Why not give Imperium a chance? I can guarantee you will love the server! We are more than a server, we are a family.
[SIZE=5][B]Why should I join?[/B][/SIZE]
Why shouldn't you join, is the question you should be asking yourself! Imperium is a fun enjoyable server where you can always PK, no matter what! The server is packed with content, and this server is not buggy! There are professional staffs on this server that will always help you. The second you log in, you can automatically PK. You can gear up in less than 20 seconds here on Imperium! There is no lag on this server, and this server is 24/7. This server is based on PKing and staking. You don't have to be good at it! You can learn it all here on Imperium. So what are you waiting for! Click the [URL=http://"imperium.byethost22.com"]"Here"[/URL] to start playing
[B][SIZE=5]Features[/SIZE][/B]
Professional Staff Team. Staff team are all mature, non-abusive, active and dedicated. 20mb cache. donation system with special perks in-game. Flawless PKing. PK to your hearts content! Gear up in less than 30 seconds. A special tab, where you can easily spawn sets of items, including Barrows and other supplies. Hotkeys for ease of access. 100% Rocktail 100% Magic, which includes Lunar spells, ancient spells and normal spells. Perfect Switching - Hybrid/Tribrid as you please. PKP shop, that holds many items that are special! Fully working Duel Arena - stake your rare items. Spawn Commands, as well as Master, Pure, Zerker & Tank commands! No lag, and the server is 24/7! Strong VPS! Imbued Rings; Warrior Ring(i), Berserker Ring (i), Archer Ring(i) and Seers Ring(i). Webclient and a Downloadable Client! FunPK - a place where you can PK as much as you want, without losing your items! All Set Effects work (e.g. Dharoks Set).
Media
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/21jpt9u.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/ma9oh5.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/167uuro.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/mbguft.jpg[/img]
more soon
